transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Daniel, we need to talk about your debt. You've been avoiding us.

transcript.speaker: client
transcript.text: Who is this? How did you get this number?

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Don't worry about that. What you should worry about is the $4,500 you owe. We know where you work, where you live, where your kids go to school.

transcript.speaker: client
transcript.text: Are you threatening my family? This is completely inappropriate!

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: I'm just saying we have our ways of finding people. You can make this easy or hard. Your choice.

transcript.speaker: client
transcript.text: I'm hanging up and calling a lawyer.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Go ahead. That'll just add legal fees to what you already owe. Smart move, genius.
